import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import CardGroup from 'react-bootstrap/CardGroup' const PostCard = props => { return ( <> {/* {props.title} {props.content} */}
{props.creatorID ?
{props.creatorID.username}
: null}

{props.content}

) } export default PostCard
